snippet.title: The Mildew Children — Gameplay Mechanics
snippet.description:
The free prologue will be released on Steam at the end of 2023. 

About the game: 
The Mildew Children is an interactive 2D adventure with elements of a visual novel. It's a dark story about a village inhabited only by children, who follow savage elder traditions. A young witch, along with her sisters, tries to save the village from extinction by performing a dreadful Ritual, during which witches often die - since not everyone is able to prevail over the Mistress of Death.

#TheMildewChildren #indiegame #indiegames #indiegamedev #videogames
